name: execution-apis
description: Collection of JSON-RPC APIs provided by Ethereum 1.0 clients

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:spec && npm run generate-clients && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:docs: cd build/docs/gatsby && npm install && npm run build
scripts.lint: node scripts/build.js && node scripts/validate.js && node scripts/graphql-validate.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build && cd build/docs/gatsby && gatsby build --prefix-paths && gh-pages -d public -r https://$GH_TOKEN@github.com/ethereum/execution-apis.git

author: Ethereum
